body_html:
You don't want to build for iOS if you're targeting Android. The cpu value is x86, but you also need to pass the crosstool flags described in the instructions at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/android

And to clarify, have you tried modifying build.gradle to set the cpu to x86, and then building from within Android Studio yet?

And to clarify, have you tried modifying build.gradle to set the cpu to x86, and then building from within Android Studio yet?
body:
You don't want to build for iOS if you're targeting Android. The cpu value is x86, but you also need to pass the crosstool flags described in the instructions at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/android

And to clarify, have you tried modifying build.gradle to set the cpu to x86, and then building from *within* Android Studio yet?
